titleStmt.title: Certaine deuout considerations of frequenting the blessed sacrament: written by the reuerent Father Fuluius Androtius of the Societie of Iesus. With sundrie other preceptes and rules of direction, composed for the benefit of such as seeke to attaine to the perfection of vertue. Firste written in Italian: after turned into Latine: and now translated into English
Della frequenza della communione. English
titleStmt.author: Androzzi, Fulvio, 1523-1575.

titleStmt.title: Certaine deuout considerations of frequenting the blessed sacrament: written by the reuerent Father Fuluius Androtius of the Societie of Iesus. With sundrie other preceptes and rules of direction, composed for the benefit of such as seeke to attaine to the perfection of vertue. Firste written in Italian: after turned into Latine: and now translated into English
Della frequenza della communione. English
titleStmt.author: Androzzi, Fulvio, 1523-1575.
I. G., fl. 1606.
Everard, Thomas, 1560-1633.

notesStmt.note: A translation by I.G., who signed the dedication, in conjunction with T. Everard, of: Androzzi, Fulvio. Della frequenza della communione.
At foot of title: Permissu Superiorum.
Imperfect; lacks quires G and H.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (ew York, N.Y.). Library.
